DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare effect CP-690,550 effect placebo patient treat moderate severe chronic plaque psoriasis . This one-year study also evaluate safety tolerability CP-690,550 versus placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A One-Year Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of CP-690,550 For Patients With Moderate To Severe Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: 18 year old diagnosis least 12 month moderate severe plaque psoriasis cover least 10 % body surface area A Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) score 12 great Are consider candidate systemic light therapy Have evidence active latent tuberculosis Nonplaque druginduced form psoriasis Can discontinue current oral , injectible topical therapy psoriasis discontinue phototherapy ( PUVA UVB ) Any uncontrolled significant medical condition
